original: Paṭṭhānapakaraṇa🔽Dhammānulomapaccanīya (3), Dukatikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (3)🔽15.72. Saraṇaduka, Vipākattika🔽Araṇaṁ vipākaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaraṇo navipāko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.🔽Saraṇaṁ vipākadhammadhammaṁ paṭicca nasaraṇo navipākadhammadhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.🔽Araṇaṁ vipākadhammadhammaṁ paṭicca nasaraṇo navipākadhammadhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: paṭṭhāna pakaraṇa  dhamma anuloma paccanīya  saraṇaduka vipākattika  araṇam vipākam dhammam paṭicca na saraṇaḥ na vipākaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuyā ekam pe avigate eka  saraṇam vipāka dhamma dhammam paṭicca na saraṇaḥ na vipāka dhamma dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā  araṇam vipāka dhamma dhammam paṭicca na saraṇaḥ na vipāka dhamma dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā
translated: The Paṭṭhāna Treatise🔽The forward and reverse order of conditions, the triplets, the section beginning with “having two as object”

original: Araṇaṁ nevavipākanavipākadhammadhammaṁ paṭicca nasaraṇo nanevavipākanavipākadhammadhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
analyzed: araṇam neva vipāka na vipāka dhamma dhammam paṭicca na saraṇaḥ na neva vipāka na vipāka dhamma dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuyā ekam pe avigate eka
translated: With a non-door, a result, as condition, a non-door, a result, arises, by way of root-cause condition.
